name: Monster Strike ☆ Supraizudo Ghost-chan!
description:
Ryona's full-blown action game is back in the R-18 version!
A large amount of dot erotic is added while maintaining easy operation and high gameplay.
An additional stage with the theme of "reduction" has also appeared, and "Swallowing", which was a hot topic in some parts, is also super strengthened.
Let's enjoy the R-18 version of the ghost who is full of lesbian etch (with 3P!) With Mon girls as well as swallowing!

■ H attack and swallowing from Mon girls, dot erotic has 40 patterns including 3P, swallowing has 8 patterns
■ Gallery mode that is open from the beginning, you can use it immediately after buying it without proceeding with the game!
■ A bold action game full of Ryona!
■ Easy operation of 2 buttons to fight with bills and axes!
■ You can fight endlessly with walls and ceilings!
■ Anyone can clear it by using EASY mode!
■ Equipped with auto save / stage select function! You can stop at any time and resume from your favorite stage!
